Title: Bad Education
Actors: Gael García Bernal, Fele Martínez, Daniel Giménez Cacho, Lluís Homar
Plot: In the early 60s, two boys - Ignacio and Enrique - discover love, movies and fear in a Christian school. Father Manolo, the school principal and Literature teacher, both witnesses and takes part in these discoveries. The three characters come against one another twice again, in the late 70s and in 1980. These meetings are set to change the life and death of some of them.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 16 wins & 41 nominations.
Production: El Deseo S.A., Televisión Española (TVE), Canal+ España
